title: Why can't fiora displace over walls when in combat?
body:
https://vimeo.com/271789838

I can provide more evidence if needed, but this video is just one of many instances.

replies.body:
Fiora's dash is super, super short. You have to use it with your balls literally against the wall for it to work.

Your balls weren't against the wall.

The fact that it DOES work in combat is blatantly clear, because your first dash moves over the edge of a wall ez pz.

fiora can dash over walls in combat. You probably misplaced your mouse. fiora doesnt dash a set distance. so you can actually cast q on top of yourself. if  you casted q with your mouse on your half of the wall you wont go over.
Fiora doesn't counter mundo anymore, he counters you now.

> [{quoted}](name=Daze Clover,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=z0A5KiUe,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-25T04:36:12.853+0000)
>
> Fiora doesn't counter mundo anymore, he counters you now.

That's not the point.

Same reason you cant flash over large walls.

The first dash goes through a wall with no issues.
